content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello, Emilia. Let's start the negotiation. What is your offer for the rental price of the apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am a student and I can offer 400 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: That is too low for me. I am looking for a higher price. How about 550 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, but 550 euros is too high for me. How about 450 euros per month? I am smart and responsible, so I will take good care of your apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: While I appreciate your confidence in your ability to take care of my apartment, 450 euros is still too low for me. Let's meet in the middle. How about 500 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 500 euros seems more reasonable. I agree to the price of 500 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [500] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
